intro: Monelasmum flexuosum, commonly known as the flexible monelasmum, is a flowering plant native to parts of Southeast Asia. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its trailing growth habit and clusters of small, white to pinkish flowers. Its leaves are opposite, ovate, and often covered in fine hairs. It thrives in moist, shaded environments and is sometimes cultivated as an ornamental plant.
